trans-unit.source: Delegates all members of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> interface to another instance of a host.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> 介面的所有成員委派 (Delegate) 給主應用程式 (Host) 的另一個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.DelegatingConfigHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.DelegatingConfigHost" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigurationBuilderHost" /> object if the delegated host provides the functionality required by that interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果委派的主機提供該介面所需要的功能，即取得 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigurationBuilderHost" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigurationBuilderHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigurationBuilderHost" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a location subpath.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示位置子路徑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new configuration context.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的組態內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing a new configuration context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示新的組態內容。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a deprecated configuration context.
trans-unit.target: 建立已取代的組態內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing a deprecated configuration context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示已取代的組態內容。

trans-unit.source: An encrypted section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔的已加密區段。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an encrypted configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 解密已加密的組態內容。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a decrypted configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示已解密的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 刪除針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a section of a configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 加密組態物件的區段。

trans-unit.source: A string representing an encrypted section of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態物件的已加密區段。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a configuration path based on a location subpath.
trans-unit.target: 根據位置子路徑傳回組態路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態路徑。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration type.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an exception should be thrown if an error is encountered; <see langword="false" /> if an exception should not be thrown if an error is encountered.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 是表示如果遇到錯誤時應該擲回例外狀況，而 <see langword="false" /> 則表示如果遇到錯誤時不應該擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示組態的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示組態的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing the type name of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，表示組態物件的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the type name of the configuration object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態物件的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host has finished initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主應用程式已經完成初始化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified permission set if available within the host object.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定的使用權限集合 (如果主物件中可以使用的話)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the configuration source.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態來源。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration source.
trans-unit.target: 傳回針對組態來源執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration source.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示針對組態來源執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion" /> object representing the version of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion" /> 物件，表示針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion" /> object representing the version of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion" /> 物件，表示針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the host to impersonate and returns an <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object required internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 指示主應用程式模擬並傳回 .NET Framework 內部所需的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A parameter object containing the values used for initializing the configuration host.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件，其包含用來初始化組態主應用程式的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the configuration host.
trans-unit.target: 初始化組態主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a location subpath (passed by reference).
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示位置子路徑 (以傳址 (By Reference) 方式傳遞)。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The location configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 位置組態路徑。

trans-unit.source: A parameter object representing the parameters used to initialize the host.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件，表示用來初始化主應用程式的參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the host for configuration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化組態的主應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration is above the application configuration in the configuration hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出在組態階層架構中組態是否在應用程式組態之上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration is above the application configuration in the configuration hierarchy; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在組態階層架構中組態在應用程式組態之上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration record is required for the host configuration initialization.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否需要組態記錄以便進行主應用程式組態初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a configuration record is required for the host configuration initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要組態記錄以便進行主應用程式組態初始化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Restricts or allows definitions in the host configuration.
trans-unit.target: 限制或允許主應用程式組態中的定義。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the grant or restriction of definitions in the host configuration was successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在主應用程式組態中授與或限制定義成功，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the file path used by a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to read a configuration file is a valid path.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件用於讀取組態檔的檔案路徑是否為有效路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the path used by a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to read a configuration file is a valid path; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件用於讀取組態檔的路徑是有效路徑，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <see cref="T:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute" /> attribute to disable implicit link demands.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態區段是否需要完全信任的程式碼存取安全性層級，而且不允許 <see cref="T:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute" /> 屬性停用隱含連結 (Implicit Link) 要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration section requires a fully trusted code access security level and does not allow the <see cref="T:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute" /> attribute to disable implicit link demands; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態區段需要完全信任的程式碼存取安全性層級，而且不允許 <see cref="T:System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute" /> 屬性停用隱含連結要求，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態物件的初始化是否視為延遲。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the initialization of a configuration object is considered delayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態物件的初始化視為延遲，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration object supports a location tag.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態物件是否支援位置標記。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration object supports a location tag; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態物件支援位置標記，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the configuration is remote.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出組態是否為遠端。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration is remote; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態為遠端，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態路徑是否指向應該將其內容視為根 (Root) 的組態節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration path is to a configuration node whose contents should be treated as a root; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態路徑指向應該將其內容視為根的組態節點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the configuration path is trusted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出組態路徑是否受信任。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the configuration path is trusted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果組態路徑受信任，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens and returns a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to read a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便讀取組態檔。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to read a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便讀取組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object specified by <paramref name="streamName" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <paramref name="streamName" /> 所指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to assert permissions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷提示使用權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to read a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便讀取組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object specified by <paramref name="streamName" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <paramref name="streamName" /> 所指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Opens and returns a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object for writing to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟並傳回 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便寫入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Allows a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
trans-unit.target: 允許 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件指定為範本，以便複製檔案屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
trans-unit.target: 從中複製檔案屬性成為範本的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The write context of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object (passed by reference).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的寫入內容 (以傳址方式傳遞)。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object for writing to a configuration file or for writing to a temporary file used to build a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便寫入組態檔，或寫入用於建置組態檔的暫存檔。

trans-unit.source: Allows a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
trans-unit.target: 允許 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件指定為範本，以便複製檔案屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object from which file attributes are to be copied as a template.
trans-unit.target: 從中複製檔案屬性成為範本的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The write context of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file (passed by reference).
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作 (以傳址方式傳遞) 之 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的寫入內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to assert permissions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷提示使用權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object for writing to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件，以便寫入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Allows a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to be designated as a template for copying file attributes.
trans-unit.target: 允許 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件指定為範本，以便複製檔案屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object specified by the <paramref name="streamName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <paramref name="streamName" /> 參數所指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the entire configuration file could be read by a designated <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件是否可以讀取整個組態檔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the entire configuration file could be read by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object designated by <paramref name="streamName" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="streamName" /> 指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件可以讀取整個組態檔，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of a section group in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔中區段群組的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of a section in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔中區段的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> object to read a designated section of its associated configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 指示 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigHost" /> 物件讀取其相關聯組態檔的指定區段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a section of the configuration file designated by the <paramref name="sectionGroupName" /> and <paramref name="sectionName" /> parameters can be read by a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件可以讀取 <paramref name="sectionGroupName" /> 和 <paramref name="sectionName" /> 參數所指定的組態檔區段，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> to use to process the <paramref name="configSection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />，用以處理 <paramref name="configSection" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" /> object using the provided <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 處理 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The processed <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" />.
trans-unit.target: 已處理的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> to use to process the <paramref name="rawXml" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />，用以處理 <paramref name="rawXml" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes the markup of a configuration section using the provided <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 來處理設定區段的標記。

trans-unit.source: The processed <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />.
trans-unit.target: 已處理的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IInternalConfigRecord" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a new configuration record requires a complete initialization.
trans-unit.target: 表示新的組態記錄需要完整初始化。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback" /> object to receive the returned data representing the changes in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 要接收傳回資料的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback" /> 物件，表示組態檔中的變更。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the host to monitor an associated <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object for changes in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 指示主應用程式監視組態檔中相關聯 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance containing changed configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 執行個體，其包含已變更的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.StreamChangeCallback" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the host object to stop monitoring an associated <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object for changes in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 指示主物件停止監視組態檔中相關聯 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件的變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主應用程式組態是否支援變更告知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host supports change notifications; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主應用程式支援變更告知，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports location tags.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主應用程式組態是否支援位置標記 (Tag)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host supports location tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主應用程式支援位置標記，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration has path support.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主應用程式組態是否含有路徑支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host configuration has path support; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主應用程式組態含有路徑支援，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the host configuration supports refresh.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出主應用程式組態是否支援重新整理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the host configuration supports refresh; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果主應用程式組態支援重新整理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the path to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示組態檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition" /> object
trans-unit.target: 一個 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowExeDefinition" /> 物件

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IConfigErrorInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Internal.IConfigErrorInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a configuration definition is allowed for a configuration record.
trans-unit.target: 確認組態記錄允許組態定義。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed and specifies whether permissions should be asserted.
trans-unit.target: 指出組態檔的所有寫入作業是否已完成，並指定是否應該判斷提示 (Assert) 使用權限。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if writing to the configuration file completed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果寫入至組態檔的作業已順利完成，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The write context of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件撰寫內容。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed.
trans-unit.target: 指出組態檔的所有寫入作業是否已完成。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that writing was completed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />，表示寫入作業已順利完成；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The write context of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object performing I/O tasks on the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 針對組態檔執行 I/O 工作的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 物件撰寫內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to assert permissions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷提示使用權限，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that all writing to the configuration file has completed and specifies whether permissions should be asserted.
trans-unit.target: 指出組態檔的所有寫入作業是否已完成，並指定是否應該判斷提示 (Assert) 使用權限。
